Time replaces money, which makes the rich trade it and possess many centuries that almost guarantee their immortality,while the poor has only a few minutes after reaching the age of 25.

programme.title: The Fast and the Furious
programme.desc: Cop Brian O'Conner is assigned with stopping a group of car-hijackers led by Dominic Toretto. However, he gets enamored with the street-racing society, and he has to decide where does his loyalty lie.

programme.title: Bleeding Steel
programme.desc: A mission to protect a young woman from an evil gang turns into something more when Special Forces agent Lin learns that his missing daughter has become the recipient of a bio-chemical invention, sending him on a quest that uncovers a wider conspiracy.

programme.title: Stargate
programme.desc: A teleportation device is found in Egypt, and Scientist Daniel discovers that it transmits him to another planet where humans resemble the ancient Egyptians who worship the God Ra.

programme.title: I, Robot
programme.desc: In the distant future, robots are created to help humans with their daily tasks. Detective Del Spooner begins to investigate the murder of a leading robotics scientist and discovers that a robot named Sonny is involved. He has to protect the fate of humans, and reconcile between them and the robots.

programme.title: True Lies
programme.desc: Harry Tasker lives a double life. At work ,he's a government agent with powers to do what he likes. At home, he's a computer salesman. Harry traces a stolen nuclear weapon in the hands of a fanatical terrorist group, while deciding to offer his wife an exciting adventure she never dreamed of.

programme.title: Logan
programme.desc: With mutants nearly extinct, Logan struggles not to give in to despair with his friends dead and his mentor fading before his very eyes. But when he is recruited to get a young mutant to safety, he has to pull himself together to protect that young girl who shares an unexpected connection with him.

programme.title: Army of Darkness
programme.desc: When a hardware store clerk is accidentally transported to the medieval days and captured by Lord Arthur, he is tasked with retrieving the Book of the Dead, as he embarks on a most perilous journey to get the Necronomicon that would help the person who has it get a fearsome army of ghouls.

programme.title: Sin City: A Dame to Kill For
programme.desc: Eva Lord (Eva Green) asks her ex-boyfriend Dwight (Josh Brolin) to help her escape her violent rich husband Damien Lord. But Dwight soon discovers that Eva's intention is full of evil and hatred. On the other hand, John Harrington (Bruce Willis) meets Nancy (Jessica Alba) and events escalate.

programme.title: Spy Game
programme.desc: CIA operative Tom Bishop asks the retired Nathan Muir to help him when he is arrested in China. While on this mission, Nathan recalls all the situations that affected his and Tom's relationship.

programme.title: Need for Speed
programme.desc: After being imprisoned for a crime he didn't commit, a street racer joins a cross-country race with a plan for revenge. When his ex-partner learns of his intentions, he places a bounty on his head as the race starts.

programme.title: Assassin's Creed
programme.desc: With the aid of a technology that gives him access to his ancestors' memories through genetics, Callum takes a dive into the memories of his ancestor Aguilar, a member of the Assassins, to figure out a way to prevent the Templars from stripping people of their free will.(n)

programme.title: The Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift
programme.desc: American teenager Sean likes to participate in illegal car races. When he wrecks his rival's car and a race ends in disaster, he's sent to his father in Tokyo to avoid a prison sentence, and there, he discovers the underworld of street racing.(n)

programme.title: Fast & Furious
programme.desc: Ex-con Dom Toretto and FBI agent, Brian O'Connor, must put aside their feuds and team up to take down a heroin importer.(n)

programme.title: Hercules
programme.desc: After twelve arduous labours and the loss of his family, Hercules found solace in bloody battle. Over the years he warmed to the company of six similar souls, as the King of Thrace hires them to train his men to become the greatest army of all time.(n)

programme.title: Ben-Hur
programme.desc: Judah Ben-Hur is a man who has been accused of a crime he did not commit, turning his life upside down as he seeks to avenge himself on his adopted brother, who framed him for the crime.(n)

programme.title: Face/Off
programme.desc: To foil a terrorist plot by ruthless criminal Castor Troy, FBI Special Agent Sean Archer agrees to undergo a surgical face implant to impersonate Troy physically, only to find that Troy is fighting him back using the same technique.(n)

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Fallout
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt and his IMF team race against time to locate three nuclear warheads before an extremist group detonate them in various locations around the world.(n)

programme.title: Galveston
programme.desc: As he barely escapes a fatal set up by his mobster boss, hitman Ryan finds himself accompanied by Rocky, a young prostitute that he saves, as he tries to find his way back to his hometown to recuperate and plan his revenge.(n)

programme.title: Basic
programme.desc: Commander Col. Bill calls his old friend, ex-Ranger Hardy, to investigate the disappearance of a Sgt. and several of his cadets during a training exercise. At first, Capt. Julia Osborne disapproves of Hardy, until she decides to work with him to uncover the mystery.(n)

programme.title: Triple 9
programme.desc: A gang plans a big heist with a group of corrupt cops, by calling in a 999 dispatch, which is code for “officer down” to lure out a rookie officer, in order for them to pull-off their heist – their plan take unforeseen turns when an unsuspected member has a change of mind.(n)

programme.title: Face/Off
programme.desc: To foil a terrorist plot by ruthless criminal Castor Troy, FBI Special Agent Sean Archer agrees to undergo a surgical face implant to impersonate Troy physically, only to find that Troy is fighting him back using the same technique.(n)

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Fallout
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt and his IMF team race against time to locate three nuclear warheads before an extremist group detonate them in various locations around the world.(n)

programme.title: Remember Me
programme.desc: In the wake of his brother's suicide, Tyler's family splinters off under the pressure of their trauma. When he meets Ally, they find solace for their individual familial troubles in each other's arms. Love is born amid tragedy as both Ally and Tyler change each other's lives.

programme.title: Il paradiso delle signore
programme.desc: The story of a poor girl from southern Italy who comes to Milan to escape from her cheating fiancé. She finds a job as a sales representative in a store, but quickly gets into trouble with her manager.

programme.title: Misery
programme.desc: When the famous novelist Paul Sheldon has an accident, his life spirals out of control. Nurse Annie Wilkes takes him to her remote house, but Sheldon gradually discovers that she is an obsessed fan of his works, and she is only torturing him slowly to get him to write her stories.

programme.desc: The true story of how car designer Carroll Shelby and race car driver Ken Miles teamed up for the daring task of building a car for Ford Motor Company, one that enabled them to challenge the reign of Enzo Ferrari's cars at the 24 Hours of Le Mans.(n)

programme.title: Papillon
programme.desc: In the wake of a wrongful murder conviction, Henry is sent to a remote penitentiary colony. Once there, he soon comes to bond with another inmate, Louis Dega. Together, they plan for their escape.

programme.title: 25th Hour
programme.desc: After a drug dealer is convicted and cornered by the DEA in New York, (Montgomery Brogan) re-evaluates his life in the remaining 24 hours before facing a seven-year sentence.

programme.title: Pawn Sacrifice
programme.desc: During the Cold War era between the US and the former Soviet Union, the true story of the legendary American chess player Bobby Fischer (Toby Maguire), and the circumstances of his confrontation with his Russian counterpart Boris Spassky (Liev Schreiber) in a high level game of chess.

programme.title: Green Book
programme.desc: In 1962, Tony "Tony Lip” (Viggo Mortensen), an Italian-American tough bouncer, is hired to be the driver for the African-American classical pianist Dr. Don Shirley (Mahershala Ali) for a concert tour into the Deep South states. Because of America's racial segregation, Shirley relies on The Negro Motorist Green Book to guide them to small hotels, restaurants and gas stations. As the disparate pair witness and endure America's appalling injustices on the road, they find a newfound respect for each that opens their eyes to the world around them.

programme.title: Malcolm X
programme.desc: A biography of the African-American Muslim minister and human rights activist Malcolm X, who started his life as a gangster before converting to Islam and finally getting assassinated in 1965.

programme.title: The Count of Monte Cristo
programme.desc: Dantes is falsely accused by his best friend Fernand and is imprisoned in an island prison for 13 years. Dantes escapes and transforms himself into a rich count and dreams of only one thing: revenge.

programme.title: The Founder
programme.desc: The true story of how one man, Ray Kroc, turned a burger joint into one of the biggest food-chains in the world, turning McDonald's from a small, albeit popular, walk-up restaurant run by the brothers Mac and Dick McDonald into a franchise worth billions.

programme.title: DragonHeart
programme.desc: After inadvertently granting King Einon immortality when he gives him a piece of his heart to heal him, the dragon Draco joins forces with Einon's former mentor, the knight Bowen, as they seek to put an end to Einon's reign of terror as the tyrant king rules his kingdom with fire and blood.

programme.title: Inception
programme.desc: Armed with a technology that enables him to enter people's dreams and get access to their subconscious, Dom is hired to carry out a complicated task: set up the perfect circumstances to plant an idea in the mind of a businessman in the dream world.

programme.title: Alone in Berlin
programme.desc: When their only son is killed in battle during WWII, the German couple Otto and Anna decide to resist the Nazi regime by writing postcards to urge people to protest against their government.

programme.title: Bohemian Rhapsody
programme.desc: The story behind the song (Bohemian Rhapsody) written by Freddie Mercury and sung by the English rock band Queen, where Freddie was a member of the band. The film documents the events of the years that led Queen to their legendary appearance at the Live Aid concert in 1985.

programme.title: Troy
programme.desc: The film depicts the epic of the Iliad, which tells the story of the siege of the city of Troy, where (Achilles) led a Trojan war for ten years,during which a fight between him and (Agamemnon) took place.

programme.title: Alexander
programme.desc: The true story of Alexander the Great's conquests and the unprecedented military feat of conquering 90% of the known world by the age of 27, as well as his relationship with his childhood friend Hephaistionand his wife Roxane.

programme.title: The Age of Adaline
programme.desc: Adaline Bowman (Blake Lively) is born in the early 1920s. After an accident, she becomes ageless. She remains 29 years old for eight decades, and after years of isolation, she meets a man who rekindles her passion for life. She spends a weekend with his parents, and finds her secret threatened.

programme.title: Jobs
programme.desc: The extraordinary story of Steve Jobs: from college dropout to Apple founder, entrepreneur, and creator of one of the most widespread devices of the 21st century, the iPhone.

programme.title: After the Wedding
programme.desc: Isabel runs an orphanage in the Indian city of Kolkata, but she desperately needs money to keep the shelter in place, she travels to New York City to meet a benefactor who might help her with funding.

programme.title: Big
programme.desc: When thirteen-year-old Josh Baskin makes a wish to be 'big' to impress an older girl, he finds his wish granted as he's left to adjust to being a little boy in a grown man's body.

programme.title: The Martian
programme.desc: In the wake of a deadly martian storm, a space crew leaves one of their own behind, mistakenly believing him to be dead, only it turns out the astronaut is still alive. With little resources and limited supplies, he struggles to find means of survival and let those on Earth know of his presence.

programme.title: Dark Waters
programme.desc: The true story of how one man stood up against a major corporation after the latter is connected to a number of deaths. Filing a lawsuit against the company, he faces a tremendous amount of pressure as he tries to put a stop to their practices that pollute the environment.

programme.title: The Sixth Sense
programme.desc: Child psychologist, Dr. Malcolm Crowe, sees a boy with a strange case: he receives visitations from ghosts who had unresolved traumas while alive. The mother consults the doctor to treat her son, but what if her son isn't really sick and what he sees bears truth to it.

programme.title: Unbreakable
programme.desc: David Dunn is the sole survivor of a horrific train-crash that killed 131 people. An obscure character approaches Dunn as he thinks he has something extraordinary about him.

programme.title: Allied
programme.desc: In 1942 during World War II, Canadian intelligence officer, Max Vatan, is partnered with French Resistance fighter, Marianne Beausejour, in an assasination mission in Casablanca. They fall in love and get married in London after which Max is confronted with an allegation from his superiors that Marianne is a German spy and if proved to be true, Max must execute her. Defying the set plan, Max decides to find out the truth about his wife on his own and endangers his life and those who try to help him in the process.

programme.title: The Grey
programme.desc: In the North Pole within dramatic events, an oil drilling team faces harsh conditions and predatory wolves after their plane crash.

programme.title: Unbreakable
programme.desc: David Dunn is the sole survivor of a horrific train-crash that killed 131 people. An obscure character approaches Dunn as he thinks he has something extraordinary about him.

programme.title: Dream House Nightmare
programme.desc: What was supposed to be a lucky purchase for a married couple turns into a nightmare when they discover that their dream house is coveted by an unstable woman who is willing to do anything to force them out.

programme.title: Big
programme.desc: When thirteen-year-old Josh Baskin makes a wish to be 'big' to impress an older girl, he finds his wish granted as he's left to adjust to being a little boy in a grown man's body.

programme.title: The Martian
programme.desc: In the wake of a deadly martian storm, a space crew leaves one of their own behind, mistakenly believing him to be dead, only it turns out the astronaut is still alive. With little resources and limited supplies, he struggles to find means of survival and let those on Earth know of his presence.(n)

programme.title: Dark Waters
programme.desc: The true story of how one man stood up against a major corporation after the latter is connected to a number of deaths. Filing a lawsuit against the company, he faces a tremendous amount of pressure as he tries to put a stop to their practices that pollute the environment.(n)

programme.title: Misery
programme.desc: When the famous novelist Paul Sheldon has an accident, his life spirals out of control. Nurse Annie Wilkes takes him to her remote house, but Sheldon gradually discovers that she is an obsessed fan of his works, and she is only torturing him slowly to get him to write her stories.(n)

During World War I, two British soldiers go on an impossible mission, where they must enter the enemy territory, to deliver a message to prevent their beleaguered troops from marching towards a deadly trap.(n)

programme.title: Life of Pi
programme.desc: Young boy Pi Patel is left adrift in the ocean after a storm wrecks the ship carrying his family and their zoo animals from India to Canada. He finds himself alone with a zebra, , a hyena and a Bengal tiger and the journey to fight for survival begins.(n)

programme.title: The Limehouse Golem
programme.desc: When horrific murders occur one after the other, some people start to think that the myth Golem is the cause for all these misfortunes.(n)

programme.title: The Interpreter
programme.desc: Silvia Broome, who works as an interpreter for the U.S. government, overhears death threats towards an African president. When she discloses what she heard, her life turns upside down, and she becomes a target. She is then placed under protection of agent Tobin Keller.(n)

programme.title: Broken City
programme.desc: In a broken city full of injustice and corruption, when an ex-cop is betrayed, he seeks to exact revenge on the city's most notorious public figure, Nicholas Hostetler, in an attempt to get his salvation.(n)

programme.title: Half Nelson
programme.desc: Two lost souls find solace in each other after Drey uncovers the drug habit of her history teacher, Dan. The awkward situation quickly develops into a friendship that proves crucial for the survival of both of them.(n)

programme.title: Braveheart
programme.desc: Twenty years after the death of his father and brother at the hands of the English, Scottish rebel William Wallace returns to his homeland after becoming an expert in the arts of war . Forming a fierce military force from the villagers against the English, who murdered his secret bride.(n)

programme.title: The Man in the Iron Mask
programme.desc: As the anger against King Louis XIV reaches boiling point, the three Musketeers unite with D'Artagnan to replace the hated king with his secret twin brother who has been imprisoned and put in an iron mask to hide his true identity.(n)

programme.title: 12 Years a Slave
programme.desc: Based on the inspiring story of Solomon Northup, a free African-American from upstate New York who was sold into slavery in 1841, as he endures the most terrible kinds of torture and humiliation in his journey of survival and freedom.(n)

programme.title: Love to the Rescue
programme.desc: Two single parents find love in the most unexpected place: a school pet adoption function. With both Kate and Eric vying to adopt the same dog, they end up agreeing to share custody of the rescue dog, a notion that ends up bringing them closer than they ever expected.(n)

programme.title: Big Momma's House
programme.desc: When a charming woman and her son are in danger of robbery, an FBI agent goes undercover as an overweight grandmother to help keep them safe by staying in the same house.(n)

programme.title: Face/Off
programme.desc: To foil a terrorist plot by ruthless criminal Castor Troy, FBI Special Agent Sean Archer agrees to undergo a surgical face implant to impersonate Troy physically, only to find that Troy is fighting him back using the same technique.

programme.title: Inconceivable
programme.desc: Katie, a mysterious young woman, is moving with her daughter to escape her past, when she meets Angela Morgan, a mother of a single child who dreams of having a bigger family with her husband Brian, who eventually invite Katie to move in with them to be their daughter's nanny.

programme.title: Independence Day
programme.desc: Massive alien spacecrafts invade earth, causing chaos in communication systems around the world. A scientist discovers their plan to attack major points worldwide and invade earth. A fight for freedom begins between humans and aliens.

programme.title: The Hunger Games
programme.desc: In a dystopian post-apocalyptic future in the nation of Panem, Katniss Everdeen (Lawrence) volunteers to take her younger sister's place in the Hunger Games, where boys and girls between the ages of 12 and 18 are required to fight to death in a televised annual event until there is one remaining who will be crowned the victor.

programme.title: 47 Meters Down: Uncaged
programme.desc: In this sequel, four teenage girls go diving in a ruined underwater city, discover that they are not alone in a maze of submerged caves and that they've entered the territory of fierce sharks.

programme.title: Unstoppable
programme.desc: A runaway train carrying toxic chemicals must be stopped before it derails and kills everyone in town. Its up to a train conductor and engineer (Denzel Washington and Chris Pine) to stop the train in time.

programme.title: The Lookout
programme.desc: Once a school athlete, Chris tries to turn over a new leaf as he gets a job as a janitor at a bank. As he attempts to turn his life around and enjoy a normal existence, things go awry when he finds himself accused of planning a grand heist.

programme.title: Last Night
programme.desc: With their marriage on the rocks, Joanna and Michael brave one night of temptation as he takes a trip with a colleague he is attracted to, and she comes in contact with a former lover.

programme.title: Dangerous Minds
programme.desc: Louanne Johnson is an ex-marine turned teacher who breaks up with her husband. Her teacher friend tries to get her a temporary job as a teacher in the same school. Johnson struggles as she tries to deal with her bright but underachieving students.(n)

programme.desc: David Dunn is the sole survivor of a horrific train-crash that killed 131 people. An obscure character approaches Dunn as he thinks he has something extraordinary about him.(n)

programme.title: Rosie
programme.desc: Forced into homelessness when their landlord sells their house, a mother desperately tries to shield her children from the harsh reality of their situation as she tries to find a place for them to stay.(n)

programme.title: The Hate U Give
programme.desc: Caught between two worlds as a black teenager attending a predominantly white school, Starr's straddling of the line between the two becomes harder when she witnesses a white cop killing her childhood best friend, leaving her under pressure from both sides as she struggles to figure out what to do.(n)

programme.title: Driving Miss Daisy
programme.desc: In the 1950s, an elderly widow is forced to accept her son's offer to hire a driver for her. Despite her lukewarm attitude, the African-American driver soon wins her over, and a great friendship soon blossoms between the two, transforming both of their lives.(n)

programme.title: Stuck in Love
programme.desc: An acclaimed writer struggles with getting over his ex-wife, and raising his teenaged children, as they all try to grapple with the complicated thing called love.(n)

programme.title: Fathers & Daughters
programme.desc: A father struggles with mental and emotional breakdown while trying to raise his 5-year-old daughter as best as he can. The movie fast-forwards 30 years in time, with the daughter having become an adult and trying to overcome her issues and build connections of her own, despite childhood scars.(n)

programme.title: Stuck on You
programme.desc: Bob and Walt are conjoined twins who try to live a normal life, but when Walt wants to move to Hollywood to pursue his dream of being an actor, the two brothers' conflicting aspirations get them into a lot of trouble.(n)

programme.title: Grand Piano
programme.desc: After developing stage fright and breaking down on-stage, up-and-coming pianist Tom Selznick (Elijah Wood) stopped playing for years. Now, in his comeback concert, as he is turning the page of his sheet music, he finds a message warning him that if he played one note wrong, he will die.(n)

programme.title: Red Sparrow
programme.desc: As former ballerina Dominika Egorova is recruited by a Russian intelligence service, she uses seduction to entrap a C.I.A. agent in order to expose a mole.(n)

programme.title: The Fault in Our Stars
programme.desc: Hazel and Gus are two teenagers who share an acerbic wit, a disdain for the conventional, and a love that sweeps them on a journey.
